name: 2h weapon hit
script:
local limb = matches[3]
if limb == "overhand" then
	limb = "head"
end

wsys.my_limb_hit(limb, "2h")
matches: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) brings .+ down upon you with a brutal (overhand) blow\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) explodes upward from a low crouch, driving .+ toward your (torso)\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) unleashes a terrible blow at your ((right|left) (arm|leg)) with .+\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) comes around with a terrible swing of .+ toward your ((left|right) (arm|leg))\.$
